original_text:
He leads the humble in what is right,
    and teaches the humble his way.
korean_text: 온유한 자를 정의로 지도하심이여 온유한 자에게 그의 도를 가르치시리로다

sentences.original_text: He leads the humble in what is right,
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 겸손한 자들을 옳은 길로 인도하며

sentences.original_text: and teaches the humble his way.
